createdAt.description: ISO 8601 timestamp when the entity was created

updatedAt.description: ISO 8601 timestamp when the entity was last updated

createdBy.description: User ID or system identifier who created the entity

updatedBy.description: User ID or system identifier who last updated the entity

deletedAt.description: ISO 8601 timestamp when the entity was soft-deleted. Null if not deleted.

deletedBy.description: User ID who soft-deleted the entity. Null if not deleted.
